JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Ján Šikuta;Josep Casadevall;Luis López Guerra;Mihai Poalelungi;Nona Tsotsoria
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The applicant , Ms. ORG , is a NORP national who was born in DATE and lives in PERSON . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) are represented by their Agent , Mr. Răzvan - Horaţiu Radu from ORG .
CARDINAL . NORP The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicant initiated administrative proceedings against GPE ( PERSON ) requesting her appointment on the position of LANGUAGE and NORP teacher , the annulment of the appointment decision of a third person for the aforementioned position and damages .

CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG partially allowed the applicant ’s claim , ruling that she was to be appointed on the teaching position and that the defendant was to pay her damages of CARDINAL NORP old lei ( ROL - the equivalent of MONEY ( ORG ) ) per day , until the actual appointment .
CARDINAL . By a judgement of CARDINAL DATE , ORG allowed the appeals on points of law of both parties and submitted the case for re - adjudication to ORG .

CARDINAL . Upon rehearing of the case , by a judgement of DATE , PERSON partially allowed the applicant ’s claim , ruling that she was to be appointed on the teaching position and that she was to receive court fees of ROL CARDINAL ( the equivalent of around EUR CARDINAL ) . PERSON dismissed the applicant ’s claim for damages .

CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG upheld PERSON judgement as regards the applicant ’s appointment and fixed the amount of the court fees at CARDINAL NORP new lei ( PERSON - the equivalent of around ORG CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE , upon the request of the applicant a bailiff summoned the defendant to comply with the above judgement . At an unspecified date , the bailiff informed PERSON of the existent garnishment proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE , the applicant was appointed as a teacher and on DATE she signed the employment agreement .
CARDINAL . On DATE , ORG paid the applicant an amount of ORG CARDINAL ( ORG CARDINAL ) , representing court fees and enforcement expenses .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law is described in NORP and PERSON v. GPE ( ( dec . ) , no . GPE , DATE ) and LANGUAGE v. GPE ( no . MONEY , DATE ) .
